bibl.title: Papyri Graecae Schøyen
bibl.note: P. Schøyen I, 1-25. - Parte I [1-22: Papiri letterari e biblici; - Indice]. - Parte II [23: LXX, Joshua IX 33 - XI 3]. - Parte III [24: Greek Alphabet. 2 inscribed copper plaques. Origin: Cyprus. Provenance: Northern Egypt, 9th-8th century B.C.]. - Parte IV [25: The Treaty between Rome and Lycia. Greek inscription on a plaque of bronze. Lycia, 46 BC]. - Pp. xi: R.P., Prefazione; - xiii: R.P., Preface.
bibl.seg: PINTAUDI Rosario, con i contributi di G. AGOSTI, P. CARRARA, K. DE TROYER, D. LIMONGI, D. MINUTOLI, E. PÖHLMANN, G. UCCIARDELLO, M.L. WEST, D.A. SCOTT, R.D. WOODARD, P.K. McCARTER, B. ZUCKERMAN, M. LUNDBERG, S. MITCHELL, Papyri Graecae Schøyen (PSchøyen I). (Manuscripts in the Schøyen Collection. V. Greek Papyri. Volume I = Papyrologica Florentina. XXXV.)
Firenze, Gonnelli, 2005, 4°, xii-261 pp., 1 carte et 41 pll. coul. ISBN 88-7468-026-0. €150.

P. Schøyen I, 1-25. - Parte I [1-22: Papiri letterari e biblici; - Indice]. - Parte II [23: LXX, Joshua IX 33 - XI 3]. - Parte III [24: Greek Alphabet. 2 inscribed copper plaques. Origin: Cyprus. Provenance: Northern Egypt, 9th-8th century B.C.]. - Parte IV [25: The Treaty between Rome and Lycia. Greek inscription on a plaque of bronze. Lycia, 46 BC]. - Pp. xi: R.P., Prefazione; - xiii: R.P., Preface.
C.R. par Jean Lenaerts, ChrEg 82 (2007) Nos 163-164, pp. 337-342.
Pintaudi Agosti Carrara De Troyer Limongi Minutoli Pöhlmann Ucciardello West Scott Woodard McCarter Zuckerman Lundberg Mitchell
